abstract: Willets Point area around Citi Field in Queens is unsightly home to a number of auto repair and similar shops, but New York City has proposed a $3 billion mixed-use development and improvement project to change that.
snippet: Willets Point has long been home to an unsightly jumble of auto shops, but New York City officials say they have made progress on a $3 billion revitalization proposal.
lead_paragraph: Willets Point has long been home to an unsightly jumble of auto shops, but New York City officials say they have made progress on a $3 billion revitalization proposal.

headline.main: In Queens, Neglected Sector Attracts Big Developers
headline.print_headline: In Queens, Neglected Sector Attracts Big Developers
headline.seo: Willets Point Redevelopment Takes a Step Forward
